name: Save new JobNimbus contacts to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new contact is created in JobNimbus, Make will automatically add that contact to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/14uwppnz2TBWT09NHt-hX3x23l5NeyKFKPfPXtjAQITo/edit?usp=sharing).
